reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently invested in the SHRRADOO Extra Large 52L Travel Laptop Backpack, and it has proven to be an indispensable companion for my travels. Boasting an impressive 52L capacity, this backpack is a true powerhouse when it comes to carrying essentials for longer trips. What immediately caught my attention was its ability to effortlessly accommodate my 17-inch laptop in a dedicated and well-padded compartment, providing optimal protection during transit. One standout feature is the built-in USB charging port, which has become a game-changer for me. It allows me to charge my devices on the go, ensuring I stay connected and powered throughout my journeys. The convenience of this feature cannot be overstated, especially during long flights or hectic days of business meetings.The sleek black design adds a touch of sophistication, making it equally suitable for business and leisure travel. The backpack is not only aesthetically pleasing but also showcases exceptional build quality. The materials used are durable, and the stitching is impeccable, instilling confidence in its longevity.Comfort is paramount during extended wear, and the SHRRADOO backpack excels in this aspect. The adjustable shoulder straps and back padding provide a comfortable fit, even when the backpack is fully loaded. Additionally, the multiple compartments and pockets offer excellent organization, making it easy to access items without rummaging through the entire bag.The SHRRADOO Extra Large 52L Travel Laptop Backpack has proven to be a reliable and stylish choice for my travel needs. It seamlessly combines practicality, durability, and aesthetics, making it a standout option for anyone in search of a high-quality travel companion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got on sale as I needed a backpack to take my necessities to work. Very pleasantly surprised when it arrived. Very sturdily made. Lots of pockets to sort your gear. No waist belt or chest strap. However, it carries well without either. I have a messed up shoulder due to an accident and I loaded it up to test it. Carried like a dream. Easy to put on even loaded and with a bad right shoulder. Well designed. Worth full price for sure and even better with the discount. If I ever wear it out, you can be sure I will order it's replacement from the same manufacturer. I am carless and have carried adventure packs down trails on extended trips. So, I know backpacks. The lock for the laptop section won't defeat a serious thief. It will defeat the average Joe with sticky fingers. So, it's a nice feature. Since most thefts are by Joe or Jane coworker or fellow student. I think a nice addition would be a leash to lock it to a chair leg. Say if you are at a coffee shop and surfing and stick your laptop inside while you use the facilities. Then it would make it difficult for person mentioned above to walk off with the entire backpack. I will be adding one. It would be nice for it to be integrated into the design though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Relatively light weight, tons of room
reviews.reviewText: Comes with multiple compartments for everything, built in combination lock for main compartment, heavy duty zippers, built in USB port on exterior, connecting cord for power bank on interior, super strong handle on top, mesh pockets on exterior, shoulder straps are padded….Just well built and designed, plus air travel acceptable! When traveling, you need one of these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So. Much. Room.
reviews.reviewText: This bag has INSANE space. I packed a ps5, portable monitor, 65% keyboard, wireless mouse, change of clothes, cables, chargers, 2 battery banks, keys, misc electronics, a Steam Deck and MULTIPLE controllers (Gamecube, 2 PS5, Switch) into this thing and it all fit pretty comfortably. Insane. I have back problems but even with all these things packed in with how it distributes the weight with the different sized pockets and the great shoulder straps, I had very little issues carrying this thing. Would be much better with a chest strap to help even more, but otherwise this thing is amazing.No issues with the security lock and I love having that option there for the bigger electronics pocket. I really love having the USB pass-through that lets me keep my battery bank in the inside pocket to charge my phone from the bag itself without having to dig through it. When I store it I hang it from the handle on the top and I was worried about that tearing, but it's been hanging for 3 months with some light cables and books in it and all that's happened is the handle warped a bit. No fraying on the fabric or signs of damage.I just love this bag so much and I hope it lasts me a long time. Fingers crossed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large capacity, sturdy and strong
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this backpack in purple a month ago along with several others, but this is the one I kept. I love the color; it's true to the pictures. I'm using it for college, so I needed capacity, organization, and durability. So far, it has met these criteria. I don't know about the waterproofing yet and haven't gone through an airport with yet. The laptop section does open flat and it has some decent padding compared to others, but not on the bottom so don't drop it. It holds my 17 inch laptop easily along with the books, notebooks, & supplies I need for class. I gave 4 stars because there is a metal casing on the small front pocket where the carabiner attaches that has come loose but it did not open a hole into the pocket itself,. The pocket is still sealed, it's just cosmetic. There are several small loops on front, I'm guessing for attaching things to the outside. These are red for some even though the backpack is purple and black. Not sure why the company chose red for these, but they are shown that way in the pictures - just my preference they would match the backpack. All in all, function is great.
Just the right size for a carry on.Well designed and constructed.Zippers look great.
A mochila é bem robusta, bem impermeável, ótima capacidade em volume e com um acabamento impecável.

Una mochila con gran capacidad y compartimentos para todo, obviamente una laptop.Un compartimiento central donde cabe gran cantidad de objetos, en mi caso ropa para viaje.Si buscas una mochila de gran capacidad, la recomiendo mucho.
Good big size sturdy good looking bagpack
